name: Bubble Sort
description: A simple sorting algorithm that repeatedly steps through the list, compares adjacent elements and swaps them if they are in the wrong order.
steps: Compare the first and second elements of the list. If they are in the wrong order, swap them.
Move to the next pair of adjacent elements and repeat step 1 until the end of the list is reached.
Repeat steps 1-2 until no more swaps are needed.
